examples.sentence: The pace of high-speed rail development shocked the world.
TikTok videos match the pace of modern attention spans.
Grandma maintains her own pace in square dancing.
The team adjusted their pace to the new project timeline.
Peking Opera performers train for years to master complex paces.
The lion's hunting pace was captured in slow motion.
The panda paced anxiously before giving birth.
He paces like a metronome while brainstorming.
Ancient surveyors paced the Great Wall's length.
She paced out the room before buying furniture.
The CEO paced the stage during the product launch.
Tourists paced the ancient city wall at sunset.
5G technology struggles to keep pace with demand in rural areas.
Shenzhen sets the pace for tech innovation in China.

examples.sentence: The cyclist served as pacemaker for the marathon runners.
She became the academic pacemaker of her generation.
His smart pacemaker syncs data with his Xiaomi watch.
Pacemaker implants now last longer than most smartphones.
The sinoatrial node is the natural pacemaker of the heart.
The 90-year-old still dances with her cardiac pacemaker.
Huawei's 5G patents set the pace for global tech development.
Mariana Trench in the Pacific is deeper than Mount Everest is tall.
Plastic waste has formed a garbage island in the Pacific.
Pacific Rim countries will attend the APEC meeting.
The panda is considered a pacific animal in Chinese culture.
His pacific attitude resolved the neighborhood dispute.
The pacific lake surface mirrored the moonlight.
After the storm came a pacific dawn.
The Pacific Ocean covers one-third of Earth's surface.
UN advocates pacific settlement of international disputes.

examples.sentence: The ancient tea-horse road witnessed countless pacifications between tribes.
Pacification after the watermelon fight involved sharing mooncakes.
The policy of pacification only delayed the inevitable conflict.
His pacification attempts were like putting band-aids on a broken dam.
The pacification of the rebellion took three spicy hotpot banquets.
Qin Shi Huang's pacification campaign unified China's writing system.
The emperor launched a pacification campaign with more dumplings than swords.
The policy of pacification was as effective as using tofu to stop a tank.
Gandhi's pacifism inspired global civil rights movements.
The panda is considered a symbol of pacifism in Chinese culture.
John Lennon's bed-ins became iconic protests of pacifism.
Many poets expressed pacifism through anti-war verses during WWI.
The monk practiced pacifism even when facing aggression.
Quakers are known for their pacifism and refusal to bear arms.
Her militant pacifism led to hunger strikes outside parliament.
The NGO promotes practical pacifism through conflict mediation.
The pacifist refused to join the military, choosing instead to plant trees in conflict zones.
As a lifelong pacifist, she organizes origami crane workshops for children.
The famous pacifist wrote a manifesto using only emojis to spread anti-war messages.
Pacifists staged a 'pillow fight protest' outside the parliament building.
The Buddhist monk is a strict pacifist who responds to insults with meditation.
Pacifists in the war zone developed a 'flower armor' protection method.
The militant pacifist chain herself to the tank with rainbow-colored handcuffs.
The mother pacified the crying baby with a lullaby about dumplings.
Hot pot always pacifies my angry girlfriend better than words.
He pacified his homesick roommate with spicy crayfish.
The teacher pacified the nervous student before the exam with dark humor.
Ancient emperors often used marriage alliances to pacify neighboring tribes.
The policy of pacifying the rebels with money eventually backfired.
The new manager pacified the resistant team with free afternoon naps.
Qin Shi Huang pacified the six states with his Terracotta Army.
Grandmas in China often pacify kids with candy.
The riot was pacified by deploying bubble tea trucks.
The marathon runner's perfect pacing helped conserve energy for the final sprint.
Grandma's pacing in the park is faster than most teenagers!
The express delivery pack contained 5 bags of spicy crayfish.
She received a mystery pack from her online shopping addiction.
A pack of influencers stormed the new milk tea shop.
The wolf pack coordinated like Douyin live-streaming teams.
He always carries a pack of poker cards for magic tricks.
His hiking pack contained instant noodles and a portable charger.
Workers pack mooncakes like assembling iPhones.
She packed her suitcase with 10 cheongsams for the trip.
Commuters pack into subway cars like canned sardines.
We packed up within 3 minutes when the hostel fire alarm rang.
The hotpot restaurant was packed like dumplings during holidays.
The courier threw my taobao package over the fence like a basketball.
Her birthday package contained 5 layers of bubble wrap.
This office package includes a free cloud storage subscription.
Pirated Adobe packages often come with bonus viruses.
They packaged mooncakes in spaceship-shaped boxes this year.
The celebrity packaged his bad temper as 'artistic temperament'.
This package deal includes flights, hotels and Disneyland tickets.
The package tour trapped us in 8 jade shops per day.
Our package tour to Thailand included 3 mandatory gem stores visits.
The government's new economic package includes vouchers for hotpot restaurants.
The packaged mooncakes with rabbit designs sold out instantly.
Avoid buying packaged vegetables wrapped in three layers of plastic.
Pre-packaged hotpot ingredients save time but lack freshness.
The panda-shaped packaging of these mooncakes went viral on Xiaohongshu.
Japanese snack packaging often has tear-open designs for convenience.
Shenzhen's packaging industry supplies 70% of global iPhone boxes.
Sustainable packaging is revolutionizing the bubble tea industry.
The vacuum packaging keeps liangpi fresh for 3 extra days.
Biodegradable packaging is being adopted by hotpot chain stores.
The new packaging design features traditional paper-cutting art.
Mid-Autumn Festival mooncakes are notorious for excessive packaging.
This mooncake is packed with salted egg yolks like a treasure box.
Her speech was packed with internet slangs from Douyin.
The hotpot restaurant was packed within 10 minutes of opening.
Every bullet train during Spring Festival is packed like sardine cans.
The snow on Harbin's roads was packed into ice sheets by countless footsteps.
Traditional zongzi requires packed glutinous rice for better texture.
Commuters in Tokyo subway are packed like sardines during rush hours.
Her packed lunch always contains Szechuan pickles that make coworkers envious.
The packer at the fruit market wraps lychees like a magician.
Amazon packers can prepare 300 boxes per hour during Singles' Day.
The sardine packer wears special gloves to handle fish.
As a pickled vegetable packer, his fingers always smell of garlic.
The automatic packer at SF Express can seal 1 parcel per second.
This rice packer machine fills 5kg bags with 99.9% accuracy.
The packer carefully wrapped my grandma's antique clock.
Beijing packers charge extra during peak moving seasons.
The tea packer supplies leaves to 200 bubble tea shops.
As a fruit packer, he negotiates directly with farmers.
The tuna packer increased production before fishing ban season.
Our mushroom packer just imported German sterilization equipment.
She tore open the red packet and found 666 yuan inside.
The tea packet had a panda design that melted tourists' hearts.
The courier delivered a packet of love letters from the 1980s.
I received a packet of fan mail after my douyin went viral.
That influencer earns a packet from livestreaming snacks.
Spending a packet on bubble tea every month is my guilty pleasure.
Grandma packet homemade chili sauce into 100 tiny jars.
They're packetting mooncakes like assembling iPhones.
In 1840, the first packet boat carried opium and mail between continents.
WeChat messages travel as data packets through fiber optics.
The ancient Tea Horse Road was lined with packhorses carrying pu'er tea.
Modern logistics trucks are like steel packhorses of the 21st century.
Delivery riders work like packhorses during Double 11 shopping festival.
My laptop has become a digital packhorse with all these project files.
The bubble wrap packing for my porcelain teapot survived the delivery.
Her gift had five layers of packing like a Russian nesting doll.
We reused the foam packing from the electronics box as yoga blocks.
The packing peanuts are actually made from cornstarch - you can eat them!
The contract packing included a red wax seal like in ancient times.
Check the packing slip before signing for the delivery.
Her packing for the trip included 3 swimsuits but forgot the charger.
Light packing is an art - I can live for a week with just a backpack.
The Taobao seller included a bilingual packing list with emoji symbols.
I always do the packing last minute while eating instant noodles.

examples.sentence: The landlord and tenant signed a pact with a handshake over hotpot.
Their blood pact was sealed with baijiu shots during the ceremony.
The Panda Pact between zoos ensures genetic diversity of giant pandas.
We made a silent pact to split the last xiaolongbao equally.
The Treaty of Nerchinsk was the first pact between China and Russia.
Climate pacts are like group chats where countries promise to use fewer emojis.
The panda sat on a bamboo pad while eating.
Kneeling pads save your knees when mopping floors.
The calligrapher dipped his seal into the red ink pad.
We found a secret pad through the bamboo forest.
She padded her resume with imaginary internships.
The cat padded silently across the roof.
He padded the expenses report by 30%.
Barefoot kids padded along the riverbank.
The rocket stood ready on the launch pad.
He padded out the speech with unnecessary details.
The panda leaned against the padded wall of its enclosure.

Cats have naturally padded paws for silent hunting.
The camel's padded feet prevent sinking in desert sand.
The psychiatric ward has specially designed padded rooms.
The sofa's memory foam padding molds to your body shape.
Remove the shoulder padding from this jacket for a slimmer look.
His essay contained 30% useful content and 70% meaningless padding.
TV hosts often use laughter as padding during awkward moments.
The actor was caught adding fake massage sessions as padding to his expense report.
Corporate travel budgets often include 15% padding for unexpected costs.

She decorated her paddle with neon stickers for night rowing.
His powerful paddle sent the canoe flying forward.
The steamboat's paddle churned the muddy river water.
We paddled leisurely around the West Lake at sunset.
Children were paddling in the fountain despite the 'No Wading' sign.
Tourists paddled through the shallow stream in waterproof boots.
He paddled the rubber dinghy across the reservoir.
Fishermen paddle tourists to the island for 50 yuan per trip.
The chef paddled the hot pot broth with a wooden spoon.
After graduation, she decided to paddle her own canoe in Shanghai.

examples.sentence: The paddler in yellow rain boots searched for clams at low tide.

Tourists love taking photos with the red-wheeled paddler in Suzhou.

Her hands were covered with paddler's blisters after the marathon.

A kangaroo escaped from the paddock at the wildlife park yesterday.

Filling out these forms is a real pain in the neck.

examples.sentence: The pained expression on his face suggested his toothache was worsening.
She walked with a pained gait after the marathon.
His pained silence spoke volumes about the failed startup.
The pained parents waited outside the ICU.
She gave him a pained look when he mentioned her ex.
Their pained reunion was like a K-drama plot.
"You forgot our anniversary again," she said in a pained voice.
His pained remarks about the divorce went viral on Weibo.
The panda's pained expression while eating spicy hotpot became a meme.
He maintained pained dignity after losing the esports final.
The breakup was so painful that he ate three hotpots in a row.
Watching my team lose is more painful than stubbing my toe.
The final exam was a painful experience for all meme-lovers.
Getting up at 5am is painfully difficult for night owls.
The constant notifications from that app are painfully annoying.
His painfully slow typing drove his teammates crazy.

examples.sentence: The athlete smiled painfully while holding his broken ankle.
She laughed painfully when recalling her cringy teenage diaries.
The programmer rubbed his temples painfully after debugging for 8 hours.
He watched painfully as his dumpling sank in the hotpot.
The toddler painfully dragged the giant panda plush upstairs.
We progressed painfully through the crowded Comic Con.
The dentist prescribed a painkiller shaped like tiny pandas.
This herbal painkiller uses ingredients from Tibetan plateau.
Office workers often keep painkillers in their pencil cases.
The bubble tea flavored painkiller went viral on Xiaohongshu.
Chinese athletes can't use certain painkillers during competitions.
This ancient painkiller recipe was found in a Tang Dynasty tomb.
After the dumpling eating contest, he had to take painkillers for his stomach.
The panda-themed over-the-counter painkiller sells well in zoo gift shops.

examples.sentence: The dentist promised a painless procedure with his new laser tool.
Getting a haircut should be painless, unless your barber is Edward Scissorhands.
With this app, learning Chinese characters becomes painless.
The payment process is completely painless with facial recognition.

examples.sentence: The dentist removed my wisdom tooth painlessly with new anesthesia.
Modern tattoo machines can now operate almost painlessly.
She solved the math problem painlessly in 30 seconds.
The app transfers files painlessly between different operating systems.
The new express train passes painlessly through the mountainous area.
Children nowadays can learn coding painlessly with gamified apps.
The painstaking of migrant workers builds modern cities.
Writing a dictionary requires decades of painstaking.
The ivory carving shows extraordinary painstaking.
Making perfect xiaolongbao demands great painstaking.
Chinese parents make painstaking efforts for their children's education.
Delivery riders do painstaking work in all weather conditions.
The painstaking researcher checked every ancient character.
Her painstaking preparation won her the national teaching competition.
The restorer made painstaking repairs to the Terracotta Warriors.
A painstaking inspection ensures the safety of high-speed trains.
The pharmacist measured the herbs with painstaking care.

teach: painstakingæ˜¯'ç—›å¹¶å¿«ä¹ç€'ğŸ’ªï¼æƒ³è±¡ä½ å¦ˆé€¼ä½ ç©¿ç§‹è£¤æ—¶çš„æ‰§ç€ï¼ˆpainstaking effortsï¼‰ï¼Œæˆ–è€…ç¨‹åºå‘˜debugæ—¶çš„è¾ƒçœŸğŸ‘¨ğŸ’»ã€‚è‹±æ–‡è¯´'ç´¯æˆç‹—'æ˜¯dog-tiredï¼Œ'æ‹¼å‘½å·¥ä½œ'å«work one's fingers to the boneğŸ¦´ã€‚è®°ä½ï¼šæ‰€æœ‰painstakingç»ˆä¼šå˜æˆä½ ç®€å†ä¸Šçš„highlightâœ¨ï¼

examples.sentence: The artisan painstakingly carved 999 dragons on this ivory ball.
She painstakingly arranged each dumpling to form the shape of panda.
The old scholar painstakingly copied the Buddhist scriptures with a trembling hand.
Migrant workers painstakingly carried bricks under the scorching sun.
The smell of fresh paint reminds me of new IKEA furniture.
This eco-friendly paint won't make your goldfish dizzy.
Van Gogh's favorite paint was that vibrant yellow.
My watercolor paints dried up during summer vacation.
The museum displayed ancient cave paints from 30,000 years ago.
Her abstract paint sold for the price of 1000 bubble teas.
We painted the Great Wall white for a photoshoot last year.
Grandpa is painting the door red for good luck.
Qi Baishi painted shrimps that looked more alive than real ones.
She painted her cat wearing a Hanfu in the portrait.
The novel paints a vivid picture of ancient Chang'an.
His words painted her as a modern-day Mulan.
She paints better with her left hand while eating mala tang.
Monkeys in the zoo were caught painting with their tails.
After finals, we're going to paint the town hotpot red!
He painted himself into a corner by promising two girlfriends Valentine's dates.

examples.sentence: The child dipped his paintbrush into all the colors at once, creating a rainbow mess.
Her paintbrush danced across the canvas like a butterfly.
He left the paintbrush in the turpentine overnight, and it became as hard as a rock.
Using a small paintbrush, she carefully touched up the scratches on her antique cabinet.
My grandfather still wields a paintbrush at 90, creating vibrant landscapes.
With a single stroke of his paintbrush, the artist brought the dragon's eye to life.

examples.sentence: The painted scroll depicted a bustling Tang Dynasty market.
Her painted porcelain teacups became viral on Xiaohongshu.
The 3D-printed model needs to be painted before exhibition.
Painted Easter eggs are trending in craft workshops.
The freshly painted Great Wall guardrails smell like childhood classrooms.
Our painted bicycles rusted within three months.
The painted opera performer took two hours to remove makeup.
Douyin filters make everyone look like painted dolls.
His painted compliments made everyone cringe at the meeting.
The influencer's painted smile disappeared when the camera turned off.
The painted lady at the bar turned out to be a livestreamer doing makeup challenge.
The corporate report was just a painted truth behind layoffs.
The painter captured the sunrise over the Great Wall with stunning detail.
Digital painters now use iPads instead of traditional canvases.
The painter accidentally spilled red paint on my sneakers.
We hired a painter to turn our wall into a panda mural.
The house painter transformed our boring wall into a Van Gogh replica.
The street painter created 3D illusions on the sidewalk.

examples.sentence: Her studio has a painterly chaos with brushes everywhere.
Van Gogh's letters reveal his painterly observations of wheat fields.
The film uses painterly lighting to mimic Rembrandt's style.
Her Instagram filters give photos a painterly quality.
The mural's painterly blues evoke the Mediterranean Sea.
This makeup trend focuses on painterly color blending.

examples.sentence: The digital painting sold for 50 Bitcoins at auction.
Her TikTok features a painting of Moutai floating in space.
Street painting during festivals is a Chinese tradition.
VR painting lets you create in 3D space.
The Terracotta Warriors show ancient mineral painting techniques.
New painting on the Great Wall protects against weathering.
This oil painting of hot pot smells like chili oil.
Spray painting the panda sculpture took 200 cans.
The Ferrari's paintwork sparkled like liquid metal under the showroom lights.
Don't touch the wet paintwork unless you want tiger-striped fingerprints.
Collectors pay 50% more for classic cars with original paintwork.
The museum displays a pair of Tang Dynasty porcelain chickens.
I need to buy new chopsticks because I broke a pair yesterday.
The panda pair at the zoo finally had a cub after 10 years.
That dancing pair won all the douyin challenges.
My grandma's antique pair of glasses are now in a museum.
This pair of headphones comes with free cloud music membership.
The app pairs your phone with smart home devices in seconds.
The teacher paired the talkative student with the quiet one.
These socks automatically pair themselves in the washing machine.
The birds pair for life like Chinese mandarin ducks.
Let's pair up for the English speaking competition!
The dumplings are served in pairs for good luck.
The paired chopsticks in this restaurant have panda carvings.
Scientists observed paired chromosomes under microscope.
The app helps find paired socks from laundry chaos.
Their paired dance moves won the TikTok challenge.
Zongzi paired with yogurt is a controversial but trending combo.
The Bluetooth pairing failed because my AirPods were in my brother's pocket.
Wine pairing with spicy hotpot is a Sichuan specialty.
The dance competition announced random pairing of contestants.
This socks pairing app helps lonely socks find their mates.
The smart lock displays a 6-digit pairing code when first used.
Hold the button for 3 seconds to enter pairing mode.
The vintage scarf featured classic paisley patterns in emerald green.
Designers often use paisley as inspiration for modern cheongsam designs.
His paisley tie clashed hilariously with his striped shirt.
The influencer wore paisley leggings to the traditional tea ceremony.
Paisley print face masks became a surprise hit during the pandemic.
The Pakistani drama series are gaining popularity in China recently.
This restaurant serves authentic Pakistani curry with naan bread.
Many Pakistanis in Beijing work in the international trade business.
My Pakistani neighbor taught me how to make milk tea with cardamom.
The Pakistani Chinese corridor brings infrastructure development.
My childhood pal still remembers our secret handshake after 20 years.
We became instant pals over a shared love of stinky tofu.
The detective suspected the accountant was in cahoots with his casino pal.
They acted as pals in cheating the mahjong game.
Foreign students often pal around with classmates from their home country.
Grandpa still pals with his army buddies every weekend at the tea house.
My first pen pal was a stamp collector from Inner Mongolia.
They paled up during the tough military training.
The Forbidden Palace receives 70,000 visitors daily during golden week.
Queen Elizabeth kept 300 corgis in Buckingham Palace.
The Century Park is surrounded by marble shopping palaces.
His new mansion looks like a tech billionaire's palace.
The palace coup happened during the emperor's hotpot banquet.
The 1930s movie palace now screens TikTok compilations.
The paladin swore to protect the village with his glowing sword.
In the RPG game, my paladin character keeps healing teammates.
Japanese paladins were often depicted with cherry blossom motifs.
The tea ceremony master moved like an ancient paladin.
As a paladin of free speech, she defended controversial bloggers.
The old professor was regarded as a paladin of traditional culture.
Tech companies often play white paladins in cybersecurity wars.
The Palaeolithic cave paintings in France show woolly mammoths hunting scenes.
Zhoukoudian is famous for its Palaeolithic Peking Man fossils.
The AI chef created a palatable mapo tofu with 0.1% less numbness.
Even instant noodles become palatable with a poached egg.
Durian is palatable to some but smells like gym socks to others.
The secret to palatable school cafeteria food? MSG.
The iced plum drink is especially palatable in summer.
No dish is more palatable than mom's scrambled eggs with tomatoes.
The boss tried to make layoffs palatable with free career training.
The baby panda has pink spots on its palate.
Hotpot burned the roof of my palate last night.
This Sichuan restaurant will challenge your spicy palate.
Professional tea tasters have refined palates.
Durian desserts are not for everyone's palate.
Her musical palate ranges from Peking opera to K-pop.
The billionaire has a palate for rare teas.
Stinky tofu doesn't suit my palate.
Drinking pu'er daily helps cultivate a tea palate.
Ginger slices serve as palate cleansers between sushi bites.

examples.sentence: The influencer's palatial villa has a karaoke room shaped like a seashell.
The wedding photoshoot took place in a palatial toilet with golden taps.
The palatial new airport terminal can accommodate 200 hot pot restaurants.
Douyin's headquarters has a palatial lobby with floating tea bars.
The palatial mahjong parlor uses jade tiles and solid gold dice.
Her palatial live-streaming studio has 10 ring lights and a throne chair.
The palatial memorial hall preserves the founder's antique smartphone collection.
Even the palacial public toilet has a solemn 'Silence Please' sign in 24k gold.
The crypto tycoon's palatial mansion has a Bitcoin-shaped swimming pool.
The palatial style milk tea shop serves drinks in miniature golden cauldrons.
